name: Cheetah Multiplayer
description:
Cheetah Multiplayer - enter the world of the fastest animal on earth. Sprint to victory in this high quality African animal simulator. We have received many request to build this game, so we hope you are happy with the outcome.

****Customize your Cheetah with multiple skins.

****Realistic 3D African environment with Lions, Cat, Elephants, Rhino, Crocodiles, and many more.

Note : BOTH Online Multiplayer and Offline Maps available in this game. If you don't want to player with other people, you don't have to.

TOP GAME FEATURES INCLUDE :

-- Control your very own Cheetah!!
-- Real-Time Online 3D Multiplayer
-- Huge 3D Open World Safari Map
-- 4 Magic Spells - Fire, Ice, Invincibility, Electricity
-- Realistic Weather Simulation - real weather with highly realistic rainfall and thunder
-- Day and Night Cycle

***BONUS FEATURE : Real-Time Chat
Locate all the magic items in the offline map in order to craft your magic. Upgrade your animal speed, strength, and stamina. Use your magic skills selectively against your foes.

Enemies include Giant Lion, Rhino, Crocodile, Cat, Nature Elemental, and many more.
Chat with us on the Wildfoot Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for updates.  Our main focus is making high quality, creative games with animals and magic. We consider them to be 3D Animal simulators with something special added. Have a Wildfoot day!
